title: Gerald Levin, former Time Warner Media CEO, dead at 84
description: Gerald Levin, the former CEO for Time Warner and HBO, died on Wednesday, March 13, 2024 at the age of 84. Levin had been diagnosed with Parkinson's disease.
snippet: Gerald Levin, who led Time Warner Media into a disastrous $182 billion merger with the internet provider America Online, died Wednesday at the age of 84, accord...
